Primitive.name: Square Highlight Color
Primitive.description: The color with which the starting square will be highlighted at the beginning.

Primitive.name: Start Position X
Primitive.description: X coordinate of where to start coloring. [1, width-1]

Primitive.name: Start Position Y
Primitive.description: Y coordinate of where to start coloring. [1, height-1]

Primitive.name: Source Code Highlight Color
Primitive.description: The color with which to highlight the current position in the source code.

Primitive.name: New Color
Primitive.description: The color with which to fill the pixels array.

Primitive.name: Square Size
Primitive.description: Size of the pixels. Not too small, not too big. [10, 50]

Primitive.name: Wall Chance
Primitive.description: Chance in percent to generate a wall when randomly generating the pixel array. [0.0, 1.0]

Primitive.name: Record After Depth
Primitive.description: Records max recursion depth in Table of Contents after x depth has been reached. [0, 1000]

Primitive.name: Record After Steps
Primitive.description: Records max recursion depth in Table of Contents after x steps have been taken. [0, 1000]

Primitive.name: Chance for easy questions
Primitive.description: Chance in percent to get an easy question while watching the algorithm run. [0.0, 1.0]

Primitive.name: Chance for medium questions
Primitive.description: Chance in percent to get a medium question while watching the algorithm run. [0.0, 1.0]

Primitive.name: Chance for hard questions
Primitive.description: Chance in percent to get a hard question while watching the algorithm run. [0.0, 1.0]

Primitive.name: Disable questions
Primitive.description: Disables all questions so you can watch in peace.
